creator: frank.mau@sun.com
text:
I want to use JMeter in following scenario:
Send http-request to a server and have an analysis about the response time

It would be nice to have (additionally to the response data size/avg. etc.) a 
possibility to get the response time for the request.

creator: mstover1@apache.org
text:
There are a number of visualizers that provide "an analysis about the response
time".  Check out the documentation about visualizers (also called listeners).

Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
jsalvata@atg.com
text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
